name: AndroidPolice 2.0 Dark Uncluttered
description:
A dark theme for the new site of Android Police!

The theme is based upon my style 110070, with less clutter and more focus on content.

Enjoy!
additional_info:
V. 1.0
- Changed background colour
- Changed text colour
- Changed widget background and border colour
- Removed the two top widgets
- Removed the sidebar
- Removed the footer
- Widened the content of the main page
- Removed the widget at the end of the articles
- Ads are not removed of course, we all want Androidpolice to keep going :-)

Final note: unfortunately, the Disqus widget is not editable with CSS, we're stuck with it and its bright white colour.
